div.p: This is a supplement to HL7 FHIR Validating Resources
The operation validate is supported by a number of servers. These include:

ul.li: {FHIR Server base}/{Resource}/$validate - resource must be specified
Or {FHIR Server base}/{Resource}/{id}/$validate - Validate a resource's instance
